MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumRunning(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumMoniker ppenumMoniker) cil managed

Docs.param: On successful return, the new enumerator for the ROT.
Docs.summary: Enumerates the objects currently registered as running.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetObject (System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, out object ppunkObject);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetObject(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, object ppunkObject) cil managed

Docs.param: Reference to the moniker to search for in the ROT.
On successful return, contains the requested running object.
Docs.summary: Returns the registered object if the supplied object name is registered as running.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetTimeOfLastChange (System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.FILETIME pfiletime);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetTimeOfLastChange(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FILETIME pfiletime) cil managed

Docs.param: Reference to the moniker to search for in the ROT.
On successful return, contains the objects last change time.
Docs.summary: Searches for this moniker in the ROT and reports the recorded time of change, if present.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IsRunning(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName) cil managed

Docs.param: Reference to the moniker to search for in the Running Object Table.
Docs.summary: Determines if the specified moniker is currently registered in the Running Object Table.

MemberSignature.Value: public void NoteChangeTime (int dwRegister, ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.FILETIME pfiletime);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NoteChangeTime(int32 dwRegister, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FILETIME pfiletime) cil managed

Docs.param: The ROT entry of the changed object.
Reference to the object's last change time.
Docs.summary: Makes a note of the time that a particular object has changed so can report an appropriate change time.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Register (int grfFlags, object punkObject, System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, out int pdwRegister);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Register(int32 grfFlags, object punkObject, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIMoniker pmkObjectName, int32 pdwRegister) cil managed

Docs.param: Specifies whether the Running Object Table's (ROT) reference to punkObject is weak or strong, and controls access to the object through its entry in the ROT.
Reference to the object being registered as running.
Reference to the moniker that identifies punkObject.
Reference to a 32-bit value that can be used to identify this ROT entry in subsequent calls to or .
Docs.summary: Registers that the supplied object has entered the running state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IRunningObjectTable::Register` in the MSDN library.

Docs.summary: Unregisters the specified object from the ROT.
